messages.message: Hi team, a prospect (Associate at a Private Equity Real Estate firm) using Converse for extracting data out broker reports, lease agreements and other docs would find it useful to be able to export a full conversation history into an excel or csv. Wondered if we're looking to provide such ability any time soon?

Thanks for sharing the user need. Yes, this is part of our backlog. We haven’t prioritised it for Q4 yet though.

I’m curious about the E2E workflow - What does this user expect to do with the excel or csv download?
For transferability - i.e. include the data in his investment research reports, memos etc
